page.title: 16Housing.
page.content: Ours is a very rural area and many of the houses are stone built farm houses,many of these have been modernised in the last few years.Often these homes are isolated,having long approach lanes. There are no tower blocks and very few flats.Eventhough there are two small council built housing estates in the block,many of the houses have now been bought by the previous tenants. Several new homes have been built recently,many of these are bungalows. There are very few people living in caravans or mobile homes and a high percentage of families own or are buying their homes. As many of the farms are family owned retired farmers hand over their farms to their sons and build themselves bungalows on the land.
